# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in Beacon, please report it responsibly:

1. **Do not** open a public GitHub issue
2. Open a private [security advisory](https://github.com/en-yao/beacon-eval/security/advisories/new) on GitHub
3. Include:
   - Description of the vulnerability
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Potential impact
   - Suggested fix (if any)

## Response Timeline

- **Acknowledgment**: Within 48 hours
- **Initial assessment**: Within 7 days
- **Fix timeline**: Depends on severity (critical: ASAP, high: 30 days, medium: 90 days)

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 0.1.x   | Yes       |

## Security Best Practices

When using Beacon:
- Keep Beacon updated to the latest version
- Use trusted embedding models
- Validate document sources before processing
- Review benchmark configurations before running
